name: Blipbug

evolution.description: Blipbug can evolve into Dottler at level 4 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 7 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Larva Pokémon. Often found in gardens, this Pokémon has hairs on its body that it uses to assess its surroundings.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: This Pokémon gets an additional +1 to attack rolls.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be damaged by its allies' attacks.
